Commands.Cure: Target: Recovers small amount of HP + additional HP based on own ATK  Self: 5 turns ATK Up II
Commands.Swap Turns: Gives own turn to ally  Self: Increases BRV based on ATK; 3 turns MAX BRV Up I  Target: Grants BRV based on own ATK; 3 turns MAX BRV Up I  High turn rate
Commands.Siphon Delta: 2-hit group magic BRV attack + HP attack  HP damage is equal  High turn rate  Greatly restores party's HP based on HP damage dealt  Recovery limit: 20% of MAX HP  HP recovered in excess of MAX HP added to BRV  Self: 1 turn Siphon  Moderately raises ATK for 5 turns

Artifacts.BRV Attack Up: Raises Attack by 5% when BRV is over 50% Max BRV
Artifacts.Rapid Speed: Raises Speed by 10% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy
Artifacts.Bravery Cure: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Cure
Artifacts.Bravery Swap Turns: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Swap Turns

Passives.Cure BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Cure
Passives.Critical BRV Gain: Grants a small amount of BRV after dealing a critical hit
Passives.Swap Turns BRV Gain: Gains a small amount of BRV after using  Swap Turns
Passives.Swap Turns Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Swap Turns
Passives.Cure Light: Slightly reduces Action Delay after using  Cure
Passives.Suzaku's Kindness: Upon recovering HP, if the HP recovery amount exceeds Max HP, 50% of the excess is divided amongst alliesHP recovered is limited to 10% of each target's Max HP
Passives.Low BRV Attack Up: Slightly raises ATK when BRV is less than INT BRV
Passives.Cure Extension: When using Cure:   Slightly recovers more HP based on MAX HP   Slightly recovers more HP based on ATK   ATK Up granted to party
Passives.HP Attack Up: Slightly raises ATK while HP is at least 50% of MAX
Passives.Swap Turns Extension: When using Swap Turns:   Slightly increased BRV granted based on ATK   Slight boost to MAX BRV UpAfter using Swap Turns:   HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (grants BRV to allies based on HP damage dealt) for 5 turns

Weapons.Rune Dagger CP: 35: When using  Swap Turns :- Raises the BRV gain based on Attack- Lowers Action Delay- Improves  Max BRV Up  and extends its duration- Grants  Small Speed Up  to self and target for 5 turns
Weapons.Caerula Dagger CP: 15: Turns  BRV Attack  to an Ice-elemental magic BRV attack
Weapons.Survival Edge CP: 15: When using  Cure :- Raises HP recovery rate
Weapons.Defender's Dagger CP: 70: May equip the EX Ability  Siphon Delta
